name: Aly Bain
description: '''Aly Bain''' [[Order of the British Empire|MBE]] (born 15 May 1946) is a [[Scottish people|Scottish]] [[fiddle]]r who learned his instrument from the old-time master [[Tom Anderson (fiddler)|Tom Anderson]]. The former [[First Minister of Scotland]] [[Jack McConnell]] called Bain a "Scottish icon."
